To me it looks like the first time this shared color is requested. It is then
cached (that's what SharedTextColor class is for). The shared colors will not be
disposed until the EditorsPlugin is stopped. Did you see the colors hanging
around  after stopping EditorsPlugin? Could you explain why/where you see a leak?

Which build do you use?

I'm using a  200406251208 build.

I don't remember exactly what I did, but we implemented a text editor based on
org.eclipse.ui.editors.text.TextEditor and when I played around this tool for a
while, I found this leak.

.

Well, as I outlined in comment 1 I don't think it is a leak. Please reopen if
you can explain why this should be a leak.
